page.shortlink: api objects set object in use function
page.description: The .IN_USE() method returns .T. (TRUE) if any of the tables that comprise a set are in use; otherwise, it returns .F. (FALSE).
page.discussion: The .IN_USE() method returns .T. (TRUE) if any of the tables that comprise a set are in use; otherwise, it returns .F. (FALSE).

section.description: The following example shows the result when a form that displays part of the invoice set is open.
section.example: dim ptr as P ptr = set.open("invoice") ? ptr.in_use("invoice") -> .T.
